GoHeader
========

**goheader** takes a C header file (with extension ***.h***) to generating a
Go file containing equivalent definitions.


## Installation

	goinstall github.com/kless/GoHeader/goheader


## Configuration

Nothing.


## Operating instructions

	goheader --help
